title: Calories in California Chicken Cafe
meta_description: Discover calories in california chicken cafe dishes like their grilled chicken salad, plus full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard grilled chicken salad serving (~350 g) from California Chicken Cafe menu: romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, tomatoes, cheese, light dressing; no extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact menu item, portion size, ingredients, and preparation at California Chicken Cafe. Check their official menu or app for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard California Chicken Cafe grilled chicken salad serving has ~450 kcal and ~35 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant nutrition info.

tweaks.label: Chicken wrap instead of salad (with tortilla)

faqs.q: How many calories in a California Chicken Cafe salad?
faqs.a: About 450 kcal for a standard grilled chicken salad serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein in California Chicken Cafe chicken dish?
faqs.a: Typically ~35 g protein per serving from the grilled chicken.

faqs.q: Are California Chicken Cafe meals low-carb?
faqs.a: Yes, salads are ~25 g carbs; wraps add more from tortillas.

faqs.q: How much sodium in California Chicken Cafe food?
faqs.a: Around 850 mg per serving, mainly from dressing and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I customize calories at California Chicken Cafe?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”skip dressing to cut ~120 kcal or add extras like avocado for more.
